mapper.update: update w_kill set kill_count = #{killCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kill_start = #{killStart,jdbcType=DATE}, kill_end = #{killEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, kill_skuid = #{killSkuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kill_price = #{killPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where kill_id = #{killId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select kill_id, kill_count, kill_start, kill_end, kill_skuid, kill_price from w_kill
